biotools.summary: Identify SNPs significantly associated with a disease within predefined sets of SNPs such as pathways or genomic regions. Applied to a whole SNP dataset, the tool gives as output a list of SNP-sets associated with the disease and, for each SNP-set, the list of significant SNPs.

bioschemas.name: ABACUS
bioschemas.summary: Identify SNPs significantly associated with a disease within predefined sets of SNPs such as pathways or genomic regions. Applied to a whole SNP dataset, the tool gives as output a list of SNP-sets associated with the disease and, for each SNP-set, the list of significant SNPs.
